input.sentences: the chef preps the meat for the guest .
first | he cuts up the meat .
he then garnishes it with spice .
he ties up the meat into a sausage shape .
the food is then cooked with potatoes .
output.sentences: Today I watched a cooking show about how to prepare ribs.
The show host was very precise his instructions for preparing the meat.
I learned some things I didn't know about spices that would go well with the dish.
The cook explained the importance of shaping the ribs so they would stay together as they cook.
Once the dish was completed I immediately wanted to go and make the recepie myself.
